properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , DELETE_DATE , MANAGER_CHECK , USER_ACC_BANK , USER_ACC_NUMBER , SHOP_BLOCK_DATE , STYLE_BLOCK_DATE , INTRODUCE , PROFILE_IMG FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE , DEFAULT_ADD , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' , SEQ_UNO.CURRVAL )
SELECT COUNT (*) "COUNT" FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , EMAIL FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , EMAIL FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_USER SET STATUS = 'N' ,DELETE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NICKNAME , INTRODUCE , PROFILE_IMG FROM TB_USER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE FROM TB_ADDRESS WHERE DEFAULT_ADD = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_USER SET PHONE = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , DELETE_DATE , MANAGER_CHECK , USER_ACC_BANK , USER_ACC_NUMBER , SHOP_BLOCK_DATE , STYLE_BLOCK_DATE , INTRODUCE , PROFILE_IMG FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_USER SET EMAIL = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_NICKNAME = ? , PROFILE_IMG = ? , INTRODUCE = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_M ,PRODUCT_NAME_ENG ,BRAND_NAME ,DEAL_DATE ,DEAL_STEP ,BIDDING_NO ,USER_NO ,MODEL_CODE FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) JOIN TB_BIDDING USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK != 'N'
SELECT USER_NO , NVL(USER_ACC_BANK,'없음') "USER_ACC_BANK" , NVL(USER_ACC_NUMBER,'없음') "USER_ACC_NUMBER" , USER_NAME FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_M ,PRODUCT_NAME_ENG ,BRAND_NAME
FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) JOIN TB_BIDDING USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK != 'N'
SELECT ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE FROM TB_ADDRESS WHERE USER_NO = ? AND DEFAULT_ADD = 'N' ORDER BY ADDRESS_NO DESC
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_ACC_BANK = ?, USER_ACC_NUMBER = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE , DEFAULT_ADD , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_M ,PRODUCT_NAME_ENG ,BRAND_NAME ,BIDDING_DATE ,BIDDING_NO ,PRODUCT_CODE ,B.PRODUCT_SIZE FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) JOIN TB_BIDDING B USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND BIDDING_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_BIDDING SET BIDDING_STATUS = 'N' WHERE BIDDING_NO = ?

SELECT RECIPIENT_NAME ,RECIPIENT_PHONE ,RECIPIENT_ADDRESS ,RECIPIENT_SHIPPING_MSG ,BANK_NAME ,BANK_ACCOUNT ,BANK_OWNER_NAME ,ADJUSTMENT_PRICE
FROM TB_SELLER WHERE BIDDING_NO = (SELECT BIDDING_NO FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND USER_NO = 1 AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK = 'N' AND PRODUCT_SIZE = ?)

SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_M ,PRODUCT_NAME_ENG ,BRAND_NAME ,PRODUCT_NAME_KO
FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = ?

SELECT BIDDING_PRICE ,INSPECTION_COST ,COMMISSION
FROM TB_BIDDING WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = ? AND USER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_SIZE = ?
UPDATE TB_ADDRESS SET DEFAULT_ADD = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE , DEFAULT_ADD , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'N' , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE , DEFAULT_ADD , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' , ? )

SELECT
ADDRESS_NO , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , RECIPIENT , PHONE , USER_NO
FROM TB_ADDRESS WHERE USER_NO = ?

UPDATE TB_ADDRESS SET DEFAULT_ADD = 'Y'
WHERE USER_NO = ? ADDRESS_NO = ?

SELECT
BIDDING_PRICE , BIDDING_DATE , INSPECTION_COST , COMMISSION , RECIPIENT_NAME , RECIPIENT_PHONE , RECIPIENT_ZIPCODE , RECIPIENT_ADDRESS , RECIPIENT_SHIPPING_MSG , DEAL_DATE , BANK_NAME , BANK_ACCOUNT , BANK_OWNER_NAME , ADJUSTMENT_PRICE , MODEL_CODE
FROM TB_BIDDING B JOIN TB_SELLER ON(USER_NO = SELLER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND B.BIDDING_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 2 AND DEAL_CHECK != 'N'

SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_M ,PRODUCT_NAME_ENG ,BRAND_NAME ,DEAL_DATE ,DEAL_STEP ,B.BIDDING_NO ,USER_NO ,PAYMENT_NUMBER FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) JOIN TB_BIDDING B USING(PRODUCT_CODE) JOIN TB_BUYER ON(USER_NO = BUYER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 1 AND DEAL_CHECK != 'N'

SELECT
PAYMENT_PRICE , DEAL_DATE , DELIVERY_FEE , BIDDING_PRICE , RECIPIENT_NAME , RECIPIENT_PHONE , RECIPIENT_ZIPCODE , RECIPIENT_ADDRESS , RECIPIENT_SHIPPING_MSG
, PAYMENT_METHOD , PAYMENT_NUMBER , MODEL_CODE
FROM TB_BIDDING B JOIN TB_BUYER ON(USER_NO = BUYER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PAYMENT_NUMBER = ? AND B.BIDDING_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 1 AND DEAL_CHECK != 'N'

SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_M ,PRODUCT_NAME_ENG ,BRAND_NAME
FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) JOIN TB_BIDDING USING(PRODUCT_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BIDDING_TYPE = 1 AND DEAL_CHECK != 'N'
